title: Creates the crime of bias related criminal mischief and denies youth offender status
summary: Creates the crime of bias related criminal mischief where property is defaced with derogatory references to race, creed, religion, color, sexual orientation or national origin, and denies youthful offender status for such crime; makes such crime a class C felony.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating the crime of bias related criminal mischief; and to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to denying youthful offender status to such crime
